item.title: Tariffs Aren’t Raising Prices, CNN Admits After 5 Articles Insisting Tariffs Were Raising Prices
item.description: “Prices would rise — sharply — they said, reigniting an inflation crisis that tens of millions of Americans had elected [President Donald Trump] to so...

item.title: Censorship Is Democrats’ Only Means Of Political Survival
item.description: Obama's embrace of censorship speaks to the desperation of a party that can't survive without uniform control of the information space.

item.title: Are Popular Abortion Pills Poisoning Americans’ Tap Water?
item.description: Despite rapidly increasing use of mifepristone, the ‘EPA has yet to review its potential contaminant effects.’

item.title: Indiana Sheriff Argues He Can’t Be Prosecuted For Failing To Cooperate With ICE
item.description: The Democrat-run police department 'has repeatedly released criminal aliens into the community' for at least a year, says the AG's office.

item.title: The Abrahamic Covenant Is A Bad Argument For The U.S. Going To War With Iran
item.description: We shouldn't treat the Abrahamic covenant lightly, but neither should we cherry-pick it to haphazardly apply to a modern geopolitical map.
